short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension is for user accisiblity concerns, particulaly in relation to text contrast and readilbility

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension (Palette Pro Color Checker) is for user accessibility concerns, particularly in relation to text contrast and readability. This extension allows users to input colors or use a web UI to pick colors and determine the contrast ratio between them.
